physical_examinations.relevant_findings: Severe motor disability from Parkinson's disease despite optimal antiparkinsonian medications. Significant obsessive-compulsive disorder symptoms, including obsessions of accumulation and compulsions of gathering and rubbing, lasting more than 8 hours per day.
UPDRS III score: 29, UPDRS IV score (items 32+33): 2, Yale–Brown Obsessive–Compulsive Scale score: 32, obsessions: 15, compulsions: 17, MADRS score: 3.
UPDRS III score: 7, UPDRS IV score (items 32+33): 0, Yale–Brown Obsessive–Compulsive Scale score: 1, obsessions: 0, compulsions: 1, MADRS score: 2.
physical_examinations.changes_over_time: There was a dramatic improvement in motor symptoms and complete disappearance of OCD symptoms post-surgery.
